alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and east central Halifax Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scottsburg, or near Clover, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Redoak... Clover... Scottsburg... Dryburg... Wylliesburg... Staunton River State Park... and Mt Laurel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
